author: Alnoor Peermohamed and Aditi Shrivastava
title: Some startups mandate Aarogya Setu, others wary
description: Some startups mandate Aarogya Setu, others waryLast week, the ecommerce industry had proposed standard operating procedures to stem the spread of the virus, which included compulsory installation of the app by all of its on-ground staff, among other precautio…
content: BENGALURU: Food delivery platforms Swiggy and Zomato, online services marketplace Urban Company and egrocer Grofers have asked frontline staff to mandatorily use the government’s Aarogya Setu contact-tracing app, while ecommerce heavyweights Amazon and Flipka… [+1787 chars]
